sense.def:
An interview
je uraden sestanek, na katerem nekomu postavljajo vprašanja, da bi ugotovili, ali je primeren za določeno delo ali študij.

seg.quote: I had an interview for a job on a newspaper.
He was invited for interview at three universities.

sense.def:
An interview
je tudi pogovor, v katerem novinar slavni osebi postavlja vprašanja.

Kadar delodajalec
interviews someone
, nekomu postavlja vprašanja, da bi ugotovil, ali je kandidat primeren za določeno službo.

seg.quote: I was once interviewed for a part in a film.

sense.def:
Kadar slavna oseba
is interviewed
, ji novinar postavi vrsto vprašanj.

seg.quote: Hopkins was interviewed by Wyndham for Queen magazine.
Television interviewers were being too aggressive.
